API","description":""},"securityDefinitions":{"apiKeyAuth":{"type":"apiKey","in":"header","name":"acs_token","description":"API Token"}},"paths":{"/api/funnel/account/search":{"post":{"description":"Retrieves all accounts within the map view","parameters":[{"name":"territories","in":"query","required":false,"type":"string"},{"name":"version","in":"query","description":"version","required":true,"type":"number"},{"name":"obj","in":"body","description":"Search criteria for accounts","required":true,"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"bounds":{"type":"object","properties":{"_southWest":{"type":"object","properties":{"lat":{"type":"number","example":37.77333526592702},"lng":{"type":"number","example":-122.41962774191052}},"required":["lat","lng"]},"_northEast":{"type":"object","properties":{"lat":{"type":"number","example":37.798335266299546},"lng":{"type":"number","example":-122.39320795144886}},"required":["lat","lng"]}},"required":["_southWest","_northEast"]},"criteria":{"type":"object","properties":{"all":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"potential":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"current":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"aging":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"distList":{"type":"array","example":["BEECH","BROWN","CRGOOD","CAVALIE","BREAKDE"],"items":{"type":"string"}},"searchText":{"type":"string","example":"BAR"},"filterList":{"type":"array","example":[],"items":{}},"thirtydays":{"type":"string","example":"2022-01-03T16:45:53.948Z"}}},"type":{"type":"string","example":"59440d108b03211f001de591"},"version":{"type":"string","example":"v5"},"center":{"type":"object","properties":{"lat":{"type":"number","example":37.78583526611328},"lng":{"type":"number","example":-122.40641784667966}}}},"required":["bounds"]}},{"name":"acs_token","in":"header","type":"string","required":true}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"A list of accounts shown on the map based on query parameters","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"_id":{"type":"string","example":"25747-BROWN"},"_links":{"type":"object","properties":{"activities":{"type":"string","example":"/v5/funnelactivity/activities?type=59440d108b03211f001de591"},"address":{"type":"string","example":"/maps/organizations/59440d108b03211f001de59a/accounts/25747-BROWN/address"},"fullAccount":{"type":"string","example":"/v5/organizations/59440d108b03211f001de59a/funnels/59440d108b03211f001de591/accounts/25747-BROWN"},"record":{"type":"string","example":"25747-BROWN"}}},"address":{"type":"object","properties":{"address":{"type":"string","example":"1316 & 1320 COMMERCIAL WA"},"city":{"type":"string","example":"SPRING HILL"},"state":{"type":"string","example":"FL"},"zip":{"type":"number","example":33405}}},"center":{"type":"object","properties":{"lat":{"type":"number","example":37.78583526611328},"lng":{"type":"number","example":-122.40641784667966}}},"chainstatus":{"type":"string","example":"Independent"},"entity":{"type":"object","properties":{"external_Id":{"type":"string","example":"25747-BROWN"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"ROOKIES SPORTS BAR & GRIL"}}},"loc":{"type":"object","properties":{"manual_status":{"type":"string","example":"outdatauppload"},"premise":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}}}}},"total":{"type":"number","example":1}},"xml":{"name":"main"}}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request"}}}}},"definitions":{"Model":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}}}
